review:
Had my daughter delivered by Dr. Vinatha Puli in June 2015. She understood my journey and how special it is to have a baby. I was one of her more than a few thousand patients, but she always took care of me like I was the only one she was attending to. Very patient listener and a fantastic medical guide and above all a wonderful person.

Referred a couple of ladies to visit her and every one of them has come back to thank me. 

Recommend her for her knowledge and humane approach to any problem or good news. Thank her for not being the run-of-the-mill doctor.

1st For Pregnancy: My baby was under weight on 7 month. consulted various doctors-they were suggesting to go for c-section immoderately. That time Dr. Vinatha Puli was on Rainbow hospital. But she only suggested to wait till complete pregnancy cycle and later, my baby was delivered normally and very healthy (now my baby is close 2 years). She always prefer for normal delivery than c-section.

Later after 1 years over We went again for IUD, and she placed.

I am very thankful to her that what she did for my baby at that time when my mind was in dilemma to decide whether to go for c-section or wait.

Now I asked one of my friend to consult her for Pregnancy. And found she moved to fernandez hospital; and parallel seeing patent at Dr. Chakri's clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ******* ***** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ****. She is very friendly and listens the problem very patiently and makes our self very comfortable.

She is such an amazing doctor and they way of treating the patient is really good. Clinic (Dr Chakri's clinic , Madinaguda) Enivironment is also excellent and the staff is very helpful & co operative.

I strongly recommend to visit Dr Vinatha madam for all gynec problems *** *** ** **** ******

I have visited dr Vinatha puli for my check ups for pregnancy, she is very kind and knowledgeable, took time to clear all my queries and doubts 
She even organized the time and dates for my scans and took great care towards me. 
Her clinic is good and clean with nice ambient look 
I can give a good positive feedback to her and o can suggest my friends and family to visit her

Very good and we were very much happy and confident, earlier we had visited praanam hospital as well, but in the praanam hospital we felt like a commercial market and doctor pragya also not experienced, blindly they are running the hospital.

Dr. Chakri's Orthopaedic and Gynaecology Clinic is 100 times better than Praanam in that area.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very good and very friendly with patients. She explained very well about problem. *** ** ********* ****** ** *** *****
We had very nice experience with Ma'am and always ready to hear our problems nd explains in a simple manner
Was consulting her for my pregnancy. Very understanding and takes personal care, listens to all ur problems and suggests u the best approach.Always reachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent service by the Unit 3 staff. And doctor is great with her treatment. We were visiting some other hospital with lots of extravagant tests and medicines, which she stopped and minimized. And suggested for appropriate tests and diet which is giving me great result. Thank you alot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My Sister was diagonized with the Fibroid problem. Many doctors were suggesting to go for surgery. But doctor was not suggesting to go for it and in turn suggessted to wait for more time and asked us to visit Gastroentelogist for the pain in the stomach.
